text: Letícia Román (born 12 August 1941) is an Italian actress. She was born in Rome. Román had her first leading role in the movie The Girl Who Knew Too Much (1963). She also starred in Russ Meyer's Fanny Hill. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:Actors from Rome
title: Letícia Román
